items.title: ‘Bliss’ Review: A High Concept, Under-Designed
items.abstract: Not even the charisma of Owen Wilson and Salma Hayek could energize this science-fiction film about telekinetic drifters.

items.title: Surf City, Chicago
items.abstract: Chicago Surf, a pool that simulates ocean waves, is expected to open on the city’s beachfront next spring.

items.title: In Disaster City, Texas, Rescues Are a Way of Life
items.abstract: Emergency workers like those combing through the remains of the condo building in Surfside, Fla., come to East Texas to learn how to save people trapped in rubble.

items.title: Where a Michelin-Starred Chef Goes in San Francisco
items.abstract: Dominique Crenn serves up her favorite spots in the City by the Bay.

items.title: Improving School Lunch by Design
items.abstract: Could creating a “dining experience” at the school cafeteria make for healthier eating? An initiative in San Francisco aims to find out.
